entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Thunder Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:34 a.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.3Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Thunder Bay Airport 12:00 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -1.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 2 km
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -2.3°C
Wind: E 32 km/h gust 42 km/h

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of ice pellets mixed with snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of ice pellets mixed with snow at times heavy and risk of freezing rain. Local blowing snow near noon. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 late this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow or ice pellets. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of ice pellets changing to snow this evening. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind west 20 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
